title: Application of the full consistency method (FUCOM) - Cosine similarity framework in 5G infrastructure investment planning: An approach for telecommunication quality improvements
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Sadrettin Çodur, Burak Erkayman, Saliha Sezgin Alp, Omar Özenir, Dragan Pamucar, Gökhan Yıldız, Ali Gemalmaz, Arsal Dikel, Vladimir Simic, Hamza Akın, Yüksel Yılmaz, Yeşim Türk, Semih Aktaş
